function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Identifying themes and high-risk features from online posts to inform mental health interventions","Impact":"Uninformed or ineffective mental health interventions","Mitigation":"Verify the accuracy and reliability of online posts before using them for mental health interventions","Technologies":"Natural language processing tools for sentiment analysis and topic modeling","People":"Individuals seeking mental health interventions, mental health professionals","Owner":"Mental health professionals, technology developers"},{"Description":"Recruiting social media influencers to raise awareness on loneliness and its associated mental health implications","Impact":"Ineffective or misleading messaging on mental health implications of loneliness","Mitigation":"Provide influencers with accurate and evidence-based information on mental health implications of loneliness","Technologies":"Social media analytics tools for monitoring and evaluating influencer messaging","People":"Social media users, followers of social media influencers","Owner":"Mental health professionals, social media platforms"}]}
